Hello! 👋 How can I help you today?

Based on the provided text, an SBOM is a Software Bill of Materials.  It's a standard, like SPDX and CycloneDX, used for application security and supply chain component analysis.  The text also mentions that at a minimum, an SBOM must contain three categories of information (though the specifics of these categories aren't detailed here).  The creation of SBOMs has increased in popularity due to executive orders mandating their use in federal software.

📚 Sources:
• Open_Source_Software_Best_Practices_and_Supply_Chain_Risk_Management.pdf (p. 43, 56, 51, 17, 53, 18, 50, 35)
